repairedDockerfile:
FROM node
WORKDIR /usr/app
COPY package.json ./
RUN npm i && npm cache clean --force;
COPY . .
RUN npm run build

# stage 2
FROM node
WORKDIR /usr/app
COPY package.json ./
RUN npm i --production && npm cache clean --force;
COPY --from=0 /usr/app/dist .

ENV NODE_ENV=production
EXPOSE 4000
CMD node src/scripts/add-data.js && node src/index.js
USER node
